Reviews.Title: “Very good place in a great location close to Vatican”
Reviews.Author: Swiss_traveler_70
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel location close vatican price reasonable breakfast quadruple fit comfortably 2 adults 2 children kids proper single beds tv channels limited internet hotel awful experience hotel rome staff helpful nice thanks sara front desk

Reviews.Title: “If your expecting a 4 star hotel probably dont stay here.”
Reviews.Author: Izza
Reviews.Content: positives hotel located fantastic location excellent start sightseeing rome vatican close easy walk walking distance visit main attractions colosseum etc jumping bus attractions visit breakfast included nice cost worth location clean negatives stayed single expected tiny bathroom hotel nice grand amazing photos internet sites definitely look photos reading peoples reviews hotel nicer ie nicer rate hotel 4 star overall stay yes tiny spend time sightseeing hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great for business travellers, but still good for everyone else.”
Reviews.Author: themanwithnoshoes
Reviews.Content: location cant beat youre planning seeing vatican town youre looking 40 minute walk collosseum termini half hour pantheon functional tv shower hot water bed comfortable pick faults little hot aircon couldnt close curtains woken relatively daylight yes little planned seeing rome inside hotel trip didnt bother breakfast especially considering included price healthy variety choose summary id perfectly suited business traveller pretty okay else doesnt expect 5 accommodation 3 price

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: shamrock2011
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights grand olympic corner comfortable included fridge wardrobe desk 2 night tables excellent double bed controls outside blinds lovely curtains shower excellent lots towels breakfast lovely assortment tasty treats including cereal croissants yougurt etc spacious living relax lobby computer rent half hour features hotel location street indoor market filled homemade breads cheeses fruit beer wine olympic blocks vatican city easily walk ten minutes subway stop 15 min walk shopping district lots restaurants safe walking night

Reviews.Title: “Grand Olympic Hotel leaves pleasant memories”
Reviews.Author: backcountrymom
Reviews.Content: olympic hotel happy surprise arriving rome pleasant residential fairly near vatican hoponhopoff bus line blocks avenue restaurants seatings using cane able negotiate distances friendly staff spoke english store baggage office ready recommendations dinner airconditioned spacious clean comfortable bed marble bathroom luxurious breakfast buffet pastries fruit eggs coffee juices easily imagine distant time papal palace dignitaries called home

Reviews.Title: “Better places to be found”
Reviews.Author: taupoauckland
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel five nights october 2011 positives location clean friendly helpfull staff negatives maintainance shocking beds change nights bed springs noise shower box booking stated breakfast cereal pasteries cake cold boiled eggs toast dissapointed stayed cheaper hotels rome

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: an590
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night late october complaints whatsoever spacious bathroom clean condition found staff helpful friendly spoke english leave bag day id checked included breakfast extensive buffet hot food plenty choice hotel literally corner vatican convenient 510 minute walk ottaviano metro easily accessible roma termini recommend hotel visiting rome value money

Reviews.Title: “What you'd expect for the money, great location”
Reviews.Author: Tom K
Reviews.Content: hotel staff polite speak english road hotel sits quiet windows sufficiently glazed noise pretty standard european hotels grand decent sized reliably warm shower tv channels italian massive deal pat italian pretty amusing breakfast real continental buffet nice easy stock carbs coffee morning near vatican means dine vacinity reasonable prices 2025 minutes walk spanish steps heaps eat didnt public transport time sightseeing termini station metro near hotel carting luggage

Reviews.Title: “Grand Olympic - Aurum Hotel Is Good”
Reviews.Author: jpatg
Reviews.Content: holland america ms 14 2011 cruise spent night grand hotel olympic hotel via 2a near vatican clean nice adequate location easy walking distance blocks vatican metro stop front staff little helpful responding questions accommodate checkin

Reviews.Title: “Good But not 4 Star”
Reviews.Author: jessybobs
Reviews.Content: nice hotel vatican 4 star 3 star easy bus metro plenty buses servicing 40 termini arrived wait 10 mins ready plus clean spacious quiet slept ultra white bedding comfortable beds plenty storage space lovely marble bathroom nice public spotless carpets filling breakfast minus spare electric sockets unplug mini bar tv lack toiletries bathroom soap shower gel 2 people rely travel hand luggage awful machine coffee staff capuccino nicer staff pleasant helpful maurizio bar lovely fun breakfast staff little dead pan polite overall stay deal beatification ceremonies central hotels double price spotlessly clean efficient 1st time staying nine rome visits found little historic center buses frequent roads busy guess ive spoilt staying central past troubled pick rome cabs checked breakfast told receptionist expecting driver tell breakfast breakfast driver waiting driver told reception receptionist name driver thats hotels hoping miss pick car service

Reviews.Title: “Narrow beds...”
Reviews.Author: LailaMStockholm
Reviews.Content: hotels location pretty close metro buses trams 2 blocks vatican worst width beds 80 cm everytime fall bed father actually fell night normally built breakfast ok special otherwise hotel worn worthy clean expect price

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Rosario_it
Reviews.Content: hotel bad considering prices rome anyway stars structure stay guess breakfast similar continental breakfast ham cheese moreover taste croissant bar outside

Reviews.Title: “Extremely helpful, pleasant and comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ravver
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week whilst larger visiting rome mary found checkin quick reception staff pleasant helpful throughout stay bedroom 5th floor views st peters size toiletshower clean serviced day clean towels left bed etc majestic building refurbished 10 ago using lift found useful takes breakfast breakfast typically continental selections cereals coffee tea rolls croissants jams cheese cooked ham boiled eggs serving breakfast 7am 10am catered times bar service guests operated pleasant staff prices hotel offer lunch dinner restaurants 5 minutes walking distanceand vatican 10 minutes walk range priced restaurants selection bars cheap restaurants cafes round corner market spar supermarket wide selection shops didnt buses metro close byand hotel staff helpful taxis quickly common france italy kettle teamaking facilities bedroom minibar hairdryer fitted bathroom noticed fire alarm system comprehensive maintained hotel owners keeping date

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: neekola
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel eight nights thoroughly recommend staff helpful friendly location ideal ground floor day traffic noise heard issue nightime breakfast decent continental offer hot option toast hotel clean tidy fiveminute walk metro station ottaviano bathroom huge shower served purpose slightly worried staying reviews absolutely loved travelling weeks stayed hotels favourite rome

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Sens4life
Reviews.Content: agree reviewers 4star hotel tall ceilings strong air conditioning facilitys biggest asset location sitting vatican san pietro metro station approximately 5 minutes foot free internet overpriced computer lobby despite disappointing id recommend based surrounding neighbourhood staying close vatican noise worth opinion

Reviews.Title: “NOT a 4-Star Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: MichaelMorrison
Reviews.Content: isnt dump people saying 4star hotel debate 2star 3star thats probably 3star location spend lot time vatican close metro station didnt noisy street didnt sleep windows closed superior twin supposed bigger standard twin pretty bathroom huge figure tv maybe 13 inch 1980s wifi free otherwise breakfast basic 2star hotel serve similar european 3star hotel bad brag bar watched world cup matches liked stayed 4 nights sleep deprivation issues due outside noise 3rd floor beds fairly firm price 150night bad paid

Reviews.Title: “perfect location to enjoy the sights of Rome!”
Reviews.Author: AnonLondonuk
Reviews.Content: slightly worried hotel choice read bad comments completly wrong hotel perfect days rome including bathroom clean comfortable staff helpful comment breakfast ate people giving bad reviews spent time looking faults hotel time getting enjoying rome five minute walk vatican bit walk walk colosseum sights bus tour hotel dont walk ticket valid 24 48 hours ticket entitles major sights information bus airport piazza cavour ten minute walk hotel costs 8 euros definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “a Terrible, place to stay in rome”
Reviews.Author: europetripsandmore
Reviews.Content: start positive locate walking distance vatican hotel horrible dont stay pay little extra stay nicer star rating highly incorrect maybe star shower half body outside bath wife 53 fit shower buffet breakfast joke skip real am germany stayed hotel hear neighbor conversation middle night hear flushing toilets hall bottom line regardless beats returning hotel enjoying nights rest pictures web site expedia highly inaccurate

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel Experience in all my years of Travel”
Reviews.Author: Diana114
Reviews.Content: wowthis bad experience begin positive able check close proximity tourist hot spots air conditioning controlled hotel thermostat set nice 90 degrees hot sleep wet bodies requesting temperature reduction fell deaf ears clean dated bathroom facilities adequate antiquated hair dryers mounted wall flexible tubing ours blew hot air bathroom adding temperature able staff hour disconnected 3 am decided connect started blowing hot air hilarious sad time deal guess true pay highly recommend skipping hotel favor chain proper air conditioning traveling summer

Reviews.Title: “Good base to see Rome and the Vatican”
Reviews.Author: benztraveler
Reviews.Content: offthe price travel look hotel safe provides breakfast comfortable bed shower grand olympic provided spend hours asleep tell cracks walls stains carpet eurpoean standards bathroom functional real downside creeky elevator hotel 3 blocks metro walking distance st peters vatican museum castle san angelo plenty restraunts shopping budget dont spend alot sleep consider hotel
